data.functions:
付费行李运价查询
付费座位运价查询
无人陪伴儿童运价查询
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"FareRulesRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价请求","children":[{"name":"Header","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"ServiceName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"服务名称","children":[]},{"name":"AirLine","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航司二字码","children":[]}]},{"name":"PointOfSale","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"销售网点信息","children":[{"name":"@Airline","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航司二字码：EY","children":[]},{"name":"@ChannelID","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"【固定值1E】渠道标识","children":[]},{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"office号：bjs247","children":[]}]},{"name":"Query","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"查询数据","children":[{"name":"FareReferences","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价依赖信息","children":[{"name":"Ref_PNR","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"pnr号：JNYQ2E","children":[]},{"name":"Ref_FlightRPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班rph ：3","children":[]},{"name":"Ref_ET","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"et号0671232111121122","children":[]}]},{"name":"AirlineID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航司二字码：EY","children":[]},{"name":"ServiceInfos","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"【座位运价时必须】座位属性组","children":[{"name":"SeatCharacteristics","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"多属性座位信息","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@EchoToken","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"追踪token","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"FareRulesRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"正确响应","children":[{"name":"Success","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"成功","children":[]},{"name":"Rules","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价列表","children":[{"name":"Rule","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价","children":[{"name":"FareInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..2","default":"","description":"运价组","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"价格：223","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币：CNY","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Description","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"描述","children":[]},{"name":"@FareType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价类型","children":[]},{"name":"@InfoCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信息码","children":[]},{"name":"@ReasonCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"原因码：C","children":[]},{"name":"@SubCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"原因子码：0C5","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求处理失败","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"请求处理失败","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误码","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[]},{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"底层错误信息","children":[{"name":"IATA_EMD_ErrorRs","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"底层错误信息","children":[{"name":"ErrorCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"底层错误码","children":[]},{"name":"ErrorDesCn","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"底层错误中文错误描述","children":[]},{"name":"ErrorDesEn","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"底层错误英文错误描述","children":[]}]}]}]}]}]}]

qaApiDemos.response:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<FareRulesRS>
    <Success>Success</Success>
    <Rules>
        <Rule SubCode="0C1" ReasonCode="C" InfoCode="0" FareType="QUERY" Description="UPTO33LB 15KG BAGGAGE">
            <FareInfo CurrencyCode="CNY" Amount="2378"/>
            <FareInfo CurrencyCode="USD" Amount="338.00"/>
        </Rule>
        <Rule SubCode="0C2" ReasonCode="C" InfoCode="0" FareType="QUERY" Description="UPTO44LB 20KG BAGGAGE">
            <FareInfo CurrencyCode="CNY" Amount="3166"/>
            <FareInfo CurrencyCode="USD" Amount="450.00"/>
        </Rule>
    </Rules>
</FareRulesRS>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<FareRulesRS>
    <Success>Success</Success>
    <Rules>
        <Rule SubCode="0BH" ReasonCode="E" InfoCode="0" FareType="QUERY" Description="UNACCOMPANIED MINOR">
            <FareInfo CurrencyCode="CNY" Amount="556"/>
            <FareInfo CurrencyCode="EUR" Amount="71.00"/>
        </Rule>

</FareRulesRS>
